name: [H]Bulk Contracts
description: The Ferret Business specializes in custom orders for our clients. We want to offer you the opportunity of supplying your world / dimension with The Ferret Business products as well!

quests.name: Bulk Order Contract - Cheap
quests.description: Apparently, some of the local inhabitants of wherever you've wound up has heard about The Ferret Business, and are wanting to order things from us!                   Unfortunately, there isn't exactly a mail service there, is there? Something we may want to consider bringing at some point, but until then...                                      It looks like the inhabitants are leaving their orders with various creatures in an attempt to get it to us. You should be able to obtain these sealed contracts from most creatures.                                      Fulfill the contract using the Ferret Mega Packager, and submit it here. We'll use the QUEST Tablet item teleportation technology to transport the shipment to them, and transport your share of the payment.

tasks.longDescription: Cheap contracts usually request items totalling up to 10,000 FMC.                                             Fulfilling Cheap Contracts earns you 125% of the FMC value. You will earn :                                             * 13 Silver Coins                         * 2 Trader Tokens
